modName: The Child Of Darkness Stand Alone Follower Mod Package
summary: My follower mod Featuring: Aria Bal, Phoenix, Cortana,Angelika,Tali, Saph and Lara from my own story. The Child Of Darkness.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][/center][/size][center][b][i][font=Georgia][size=4][/size][/font][/i][/b][/center][center][b][i][font=Georgia]
[size=4]This follower mod features 8 unique characters from the hit Story: [url=https://www.loverslab.com/blogs/blog/567-the-child-of-darkness/]The Child of Darkness.﻿[/url]﻿[/size]
[size=4]
Characters were created by Agent Tex ( Thats me)[/size]
[size=4]
Followers created by Donegan ( My Bro )[/size]

[size=4]This mod is standalone, you will need a body mod for them to have a body in-game.[/size]
[size=4] I use Sevenbase but its up to you.[/size]

[size=4]Youtubers feel free to Review this mod. Just link me and I'll post it here[/size]


[size=4]Meet the Cast of colourful Characters[/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80807/80807-1522612610-415260844.jpeg[/img]
[size=4]1) Aria Lustfal Bal[/size]
[size=4]- A one of a kind Daedra from Molag Bal's Oblivion Relm Coldharbour. [/size]
[size=4]Aria comes to Skyrim to kick some butt and take names and follow you around of course.[/size]

[size=4]2) Phoenix[/size]
[size=4]- An Unknown creature. Phoenix is sweet and kind t everyone but don't mess with her or you will be in a pile of your own blood. She also likes to carry your stuff.[/size]

[size=4]3) Tali[/size]
[size=4]- Tali is also a Unknown creature and sister to Phoenix. Although tougher then Phoenix. Tali has a soft side but don't tell Aria. She will be happy to kill for you.[/size]

[size=4]4) Lara[/size]
[size=4]- Lara is a Nightingale and a great archer. She is super sneaky and is most likely watching u as u play your game.
[/size][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Georgia]
[size=4]5) Angelika[/size]
[size=4]- Sister of Cortana. Daughter of Aria. She and her sister are badass. She will do anything u command[/size]
[/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Georgia]
[size=4]6) Cortana[/size]
[size=4]-Sister of Angelika and Daughter of Aria. Cortana is strong and another badass Daedra. Will do anything u command. [/size]

[size=4]7) Saph[/size]
[size=4]Saph comes from... somewhere on Tamriel. I think he likes to carry stuff... you'd have to ask her.[/size]

[size=4]8) Sera[/size]
[size=4]- An Imperial Wood Elf Sera was raised by her adopted parents in Cyrodiil. A Expert Archer. Pleased to help you out with your adventures as well.[/size]

[size=4]I would recommend spawning them at you due to the being wide spread. But all are in the Inns in the major Cities.[/size]


[size=3]Where To Find Them!
 [Dawnstar Inn]
Sera, Angelika and Lara
 [Riften Inn] 
Aria and Cortana
[b][i][font=Georgia] [Mage's College] [/font][/i][/b]
Saph
[b][i][font=Georgia] [Bard College]
???
[b][i][font=Georgia] [Winterhold Inn]
??? [/font][/i][/b] 

[/font][/i][/b][/size][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Georgia][size=6]F.A.Q!
[/size][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][font=Georgia][b][i][font=Georgia][size=5]1)
Will this becoming to Special Edition?
-
No I don't own it so I have 0% idea what to do
[/size][/font][/i][/b]
[/font][/i][/b][/size][size=5]2) Will you make this Stand Alone?
-
I guess, I have no idea how to mod so slowly yes.

[b][i][font=Georgia][size=5]3) Why are they naked and have no gear?
-
[/size][/font][/i][/b]Well its for me to do my story. Having to remove unwanted armour and weapons can be annoying. If u want them to wear something just give it to them. 

4) 
What armour should I give them to look how u wanted them to look?
-
Well you can do whatever you want really. But if u want Aria to look how my Aria looks then get the mods I list

Aria wears Seraphine and has Coldharbour Daggers

Tali has Ciri's Alternative Outfit or TERA Rogue.

Lara has anything Nightingale or Thieves Guild related.

Phoenix wears Luxurious Seduction and Phoenix Nixtion or something like that from Immersive Weapons 

Angelika and Cortana anything Daedric or sexy.
I Recommend Sexy Daedric Armour Replacer for them.

Saph uses anything Magic related. Nocturnal's robes look great on her.

Sera uses Refined Leather Armour and Springsteel from Immersive Weapons.
 





[/size]
[size=4]I'll update with there locations very soon its hard to find them in game for me due to issues ;)[/size]

[size=4] Those who are unsure how to spawn them[/size]
[size=4]` hep "Aria"[/size]

[size=4]Player.placeatme "Arias code"[/size]

[size=4]Mods used by me and recommend for them[/size]
[size=4]True Eyes[/size]
[size=4]Leyenda Skin 2.0[/size]
[size=4]Sevenbase Bombshell[/size]
[size=4]KS Hairdos[/size]

[size=4]Thats it really[/size]

[size=4]You may upload and make your own tweaks but you will have to inform me first. (If u upload)[/size]
[size=4]Please upload your own pics of my girls I love seeing them.[/size]

[size=4]Have fun [/size][/font][/i][/b][/center]
author: Agent Tex and Donegan
